name: Pilot (Bardon)
description:
You are a pilot and flying between Europe and America, 

Avoid the other aeroplanes. You can get extras: The P-Extra gives you 1000 points, the S-Extra gives you more speed and the 1-up-Extra gives you an extralife.

Control is with cursor-keys!

I made this game in three hours!

(bugfix on 17.09.22)
